Name: il Sogno
Review Text: Lovely local restaurant, a great way to end a week in Amsterdam. One of the tastiest pizzas I've had which you can see being baked live. The staff were super kind and helpful to us English speaking tourists, and got us some delicious pizza!

Name: il Sogno
Review Text: The pizza did not disappoint!

Name: il Sogno
Review Text: Best pizza in the Netherlands! I am a frequent visitor to Italy and know really good pizza restaurants there, and Il Sogno would fit right in at the top. The chef is indeed Italian but the non-Italian staff are just as good! It's a very nice place too, though it can be difficult to find a place to sit at the busiest hours.

Name: il Sogno
Review Text: Very cool little restaurant that doubles as a small shop for various Italian food items and accessories. The pizza here is phenomenal, I actually think it's the best I've ever had. Certified Neapolitan oven. They play classic Italian movies ‚Ä¶

Name: il Sogno
Review Text: Great place for a casual dinner, fresh ingredients, nice environment, they also have really good wines to takeaway! Sometimes tho, it takes a bit too long for the staff to clean the tables inside. If you ask them to do it, they do it very friendly and with a big smile! My favorite pizza is the Picante!!

Name: il Sogno
Review Text: amazing place, a pleasant surprise. the pizzas are amazing.. i have not had a proper pizza since Bergamo a few years back.. until i found il Sogno :) .its a bit busy at dinner time but i think they handled that pretty well  also all those italian products you can buy  look pretty good

Name: il Sogno
Review Text: Great atmosphere, felt like a small chunk of Italy in the heart of Amsterdam. The staff was cheerful and the pizza makers were greeting everyone at the door. And the pizza was great too!
